original_text: Keep my requirements and do not follow any of the detestable customs that were practiced before you came and do not defile yourselves with them. I am the Lord your God.’”
korean_text: 그러므로 너희는 내 명령을 지키고 너희가 들어가기 전에 행하던 가증한 풍속을 하나라도 따름으로 스스로 더럽히지 말라 나는 너희의 하나님 여호와이니라

sentences.original_text: and do not follow any of the detestable customs
sentences.korean_translation: 그 어떤 혐오스러운 관습도 따르지 말며

sentences.original_text: that were practiced before you came
and do not defile yourselves with them
I am the Lord your God
